body_html: also find that in bug in the quantize_graph.py which call remove_training_nodes. suppose a const name has a control dependency on an identity node which depend on switch node. after idenity is remvoed. const should just have control dependency on switch node, not use switch node as input

body: also find that in bug in the quantize_graph.py which call remove_training_nodes. suppose a const name has a control dependency on an identity node which depend on switch node. after  idenity is remvoed. const should just have control dependency on switch node, not use switch node as input
